text: Hans Cieslarczyk (3 May 1937 - 10 June 2020) was a German football player. He has played for West Germany national team. Cieslarczyk died on 10 June 2020, aged 83.Trauer um den ehemaligen Fußballnationalspieler Hans "Cissy" Cieslarczyk ==Club career statistics== |- |1955–56||rowspan="3"|Sodingen||rowspan="3"|Oberliga|||| |- |1956–57|||| |- |1957–58|||| |- |1958–59||rowspan="4"|Borussia Dortmund||rowspan="4"|Oberliga|||| |- |1959–60|||| |- |1960–61||10||1 |- |1961–62||3||0 |- |1962–63||rowspan="2"|Westfalia Herne||Oberliga||9||3 |- |1963–64||Regionalliga||20||7 |- |1964–65||rowspan="4"|Karlsruher||rowspan="4"|Bundesliga||18||8 |- |1965–66||21||2 |- |1966–67||14||7 |- |1967–68||13||1 108||29 108||29 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1957||1||0 |- |1958||6||3 |- !Total||7||3 |} ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
